bill.summary: 7/11/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands within the John Muir National Historic Site, California, to be administered as part of the Site. Directs the Secretary to acquire only such interests in the John Muir grave site as may be necessary to preserve the site in its present undeveloped condition and to provide maintenance of the site. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to enter into a cooperative agreement with the East Bay Regional Park District of Oakland, California, for the operation and maintenance of trails on lands within the Site.
